overview: Aa World War II themed Christmas musical filmed in just four days with 32 child actors. Haley used her directorial debut to create â€œthe most concentrated dosage of Christmas feeling, dreamy, full of wonder." While the visual aspect creates a stream of vivid holiday cheer set post-World War II, the audio was created to be nostalgic for the sound that came out of that generation.
title: Merry Christmas, Mr. Fields
